Unicron/Vehement/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Shockwave:



Unicron and Reflector walked into the command room, a beaming smile on Sun 
Crusher's face.

"Rebuilding of their bodies in order.  Unitron and Firestarter first, as 
ordered.  Then the others.  It will be an hour at most, Chaos-Bringer."

"Most excellent, my followers." Unicron replied, walking over to the Guardian 
computer.  A golden hue of a tendril reached out from the now glowing fifteen 
foot high pyramid, wrapping around Unicron's head.

Several minutes later, the hue disappated and Unicron looked to Shockwave.  
"When your soldiers are at full efficiency again, head for the Cybertronian 
Fire an--"

"And defeat the Alliance?"

"Correct." Unicron replied.  "My forces will move in and do as much damage to 
the Cybertronian Fire as possible." Uniron turned and walked up to the 
casket-like device he had first emerged from.  "I must regenerate, Vehement 
can take care of things until I return." 

With that, the Chaos-Bringer stepped into the casket that shut behind him.  
He would be in their several hours to replenish the great amount of energy 
that he had used up over the past few weeks.
